Whether due to a velstrac's manipulations or a planar jaunt gone horribly wrong, your bloodline was infused with a vein of shadow.

Spell List occult

Bloodline Skills Occultism, Stealth

Granted Spells cantrip: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Chill Touch]{Chill Touch}; 1st: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Grim Tendrils]{Grim Tendrils}; 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Darkness]{Darkness}; 3rd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Chilling Darkness]{Chilling Darkness}; 4th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Phantasmal Killer]{Phantasmal Killer}; 5th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Shadow Siphon]{Shadow Siphon}; 6th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Collective Transposition]{Collective Transposition}; 7th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Duplicate Foe]{Duplicate Foe}; 8th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Disappearance]{Disappearance}; 9th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Weird]{Weird}

Bloodline Spells initial: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dim the Light]{Dim the Light}; advanced: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Steal Shadow]{Steal Shadow}; greater: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Consuming Darkness]{Consuming Darkness}

Blood Magic Shadows grow deeper around you or one target, either granting a +1 status bonus to Stealth or imposing a -1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.
